plot outline: A theft took place in a bank named DID Bank in the city in which a girl is shot dead and the manager of the bank commits suicide. The robbery involves Ram Mohan (Abbas) and Ex Minister Venkatratnam (Kota Srinivasa Rao). Sundaram (Nithiin) belongs to the family which is effected by the theft. He meets Priya (Meera Chopra) and the rest is all about how Sundaram faces the consequences in the process of proving that Ram Mohan is the culprit.
title: Maaro
plot: A theft took place in a bank named DID Bank in the city in which a girl is shot dead and the manager of the bank commits suicide. The robbery involves Ram Mohan (Abbas) and Ex Minister Venkatratnam (Kota Srinivasa Rao). Sundaram (Nithiin) belongs to the family which is effected by the theft. He meets Priya (Meera Chopra) and the rest is all about how Sundaram faces the consequences in the process of proving that Ram Mohan is the culprit.::Syed Shariefi
